subject: mol
body:
Anyone know how to get mac-on-linux working in an eMac.  I have  
Debian etch installed with osx 4.9. Synaptic installs the mol but  
when I try to start it the screen flashes briefly and then dies.
Thanks, Bob Nuzum


--

with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
